meanings.definition: A person with whom one works in the same place or organization.
meanings.sent1: My coworker helped me with the project.
meanings.sent2: I have lunch with my coworker every day.
meanings.sent3: My coworker always brings the best snacks to work.
meanings.sent4: She is like a ray of sunshine among my coworkers.
meanings.sent5: The office party was organized by my coworker.

meanings.sent1: I will coworker with you on this assignment.
meanings.sent2: Let's coworker on this presentation together.
meanings.sent3: We can coworker to make this project amazing.
meanings.sent4: Coworkering with you is always productive.
meanings.sent5: Coworkering with a team can lead to great results.
